title: New: Soleima – Wasted
content:
Love the production on this new track from Copenhagen’s Soleima – reminds me a bit of NAO or Ben Khan aka serious vibes, all merged with some killer songwriting.

Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
